articles.title: By 2050, 61 percent of Americans will have some kind of cardiovascular disease: Report - The Hill
articles.description: More than 6 in 10 Americans will have a cardiovascular disease by 2050, according to a new report from the American Heart Association (AHA). The report, published Tuesday in the journal Circulation, found that cardiovascular disease, including hypertension, “…
